data.name: Tutorial 1 - The Basics
data.rules:
Timing starts when you click on the button to start the level in the level selection menu, and ends when the vehicle touches the flag.

For Tutorial levels, 100% refers to completing the level in the intended way, whereas in Any%, you can do anything you are able to reach the end quicker.

data.name: Regular
data.rules: Complete the regular version of the level.

data.name: Challenge
data.rules: Complete the challenge version of the level.

p12kv471.label: Any%
p12kv471.rules:
Any% Rules
--------------

- Complete each level with any budget, any stress percentage, and with or without Illegal Length Materials.

21dr0e5q.label: Any% NMA
21dr0e5q.rules:
Any% NMA Rules
--------------

- Complete each level with any budget and any stress percentage. Anything which activates the Cheat Flag is prohibited.

5q85y93q.label: 100% NMA
5q85y93q.rules:
100% NMA Rules
--------------

- Complete each level under budget and under 100% stress. Anything which activates the Cheat Flag is prohibited.
